Posts.EditableText: Right, If only ITID were around - he'd be able to give me a file to allow posting and chatting and stuff, but... If anyone wants any QuestNet games hosted, 24/7. I can do it. The link to play the game will be: compwhizz.mine.nu:#port# I'll either give you the port, or a list of ports will be provided here: http://compwhizz.mine.nu/QNports.txt (link doesn't work as no games running) If you email me, then it shall be put up/removed apon request. ::EDIT:: Server is the 3-connection limited server (will upgrade soon enough to Quest Pro... 30 users). As I said, the server is pretty much un-used, as is the connection (though sometimes I download big files - although that won't interfere with it much).
Posts.HTML:
Right,

If only ITID were around - he'd be able to give me a file to allow posting and chatting and stuff, but...
If anyone wants any QuestNet games hosted, 24/7. I can do it.
The link to play the game will be:
compwhizz.mine.nu:#port#
I'll either give you the port, or a list of ports will be provided here:
http://compwhizz.mine.nu/QNports.txt (link doesn't work as no games running)

If you email me, then it shall be put up/removed apon request.

::EDIT::
Server is the 3-connection limited server (will upgrade soon enough to Quest Pro... 30 users).
As I said, the server is pretty much un-used, as is the connection (though sometimes I download big files - although that won't interfere with it much).
